title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Science Problem-Solving Workshops Based on Real-Life Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three-stage project management model (3 Square Model) to solve real-world scientific problems.
Learners can collaborate with team members using a mobile platform to create weekly project progress reports
Learners can identify uncertain elements in the scientific problem-solving process and develop response strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
